api/System.Runtime.AssemblyLoader.html.title: Class AssemblyLoader
api/System.Runtime.AssemblyLoader.html.keywords: Class AssemblyLoader This class contains logic to load and unload .NET assemblies. Inheritance System.Object AssemblyLoader Namespace : System.Runtime Assembly : CG.Runtime.dll Syntax public class AssemblyLoader : AssemblyLoadContext Constructors AssemblyLoader() This constructor creates a new instance of the AssemblyLoader class. Declaration public AssemblyLoader() AssemblyLoader(Boolean) This constructor creates a new instance of the AssemblyLoader class. Declaration public AssemblyLoader(bool isCollectible) Parameters Type Name Description System.Boolean isCollectible True to enable unloading assemblies from the loading context. AssemblyLoader(String, Boolean) This constructor creates a new instance of the AssemblyLoader class. Declaration public AssemblyLoader(string assemblyContextName, bool isCollectible) Parameters Type Name Description System.String assemblyContextName The name of the assembly loading context. System.Boolean isCollectible True to enable unloading assemblies from the loading context. AssemblyLoader(String, String, Boolean) This constructor creates a new instance of the AssemblyLoader class. Declaration public AssemblyLoader(string baseDirectory, string assemblyContextName, bool isCollectible) Parameters Type Name Description System.String baseDirectory The base directory to use for resolving assemblies at runtime. System.String assemblyContextName The name of the assembly loading context. System.Boolean isCollectible True to enable unloading assemblies from the loading context. Methods Load(AssemblyName) This method allows an assembly to be loaded based on it's assembly name. Declaration protected override Assembly Load(AssemblyName assemblyName) Parameters Type Name Description AssemblyName assemblyName The assembly name to user for the operation. Returns Type Description Assembly An object. LoadUnmanagedDll(String) This method allows an unmanaged library to be loaded, by name. Declaration protected override IntPtr LoadUnmanagedDll(string unmanagedDllName) Parameters Type Name Description System.String unmanagedDllName The assembly name to use for the operation. Returns Type Description System.IntPtr An System.IntPtr object.
